GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, sorted by created_at descending by default

GET /api/articles/:id.description: returns a single object with article details of the specified article id give

article_id = 4.title: Student SUES Mitch!
article_id = 4.author: rogersop
article_id = 4.body: We all love Mitch and his wonderful, unique typing style. However, the volume of his typing has ALLEGEDLY burst another students eardrums, and they are now suing for damages

GET /api/articles/:id/comments.description: returns an array of comments for the given article ID. The comments will be delivered in order of newest comment to the oldest
